price: 30. Dat is omdat Allah de waarheid is en alles wat jullie naast Hem aanroepen valsheid is, en dat Allah de Allerhoogste, de Allergrootste is.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-anna mā yadʿūna min dūnihi al-bāṭilu wa-anna al-laha huwa al-ʿaliyu al-kabīru
